issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] ArrowReader fails with seg fault
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6890](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6890). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ArrowReader fails with seg fault when trying to read an unsupported type, like Utf8. We should have it return an Err instead of causing a segmentation fault.

 

See <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5641> for a reproducible test.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6890?focusedCommentId=16987900) by Renjie Liu (liurenjie1024):*
`[~andygrove]`  Are you going to retry with new version of arrow reader?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6890?focusedCommentId=16987902) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Yes, thanks `[~liurenjie1024]` I hope to get to it this weekend

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6890?focusedCommentId=17068750) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
This was fixed some time ago
